name: Shining Shield
content: Once per round, when the wielder of this shield is subject to a melee attack, they may make a blinded bane attack against the attacker. The item makes the following attack: Blinded 5 versus Guard.

data.Description: Once per round, when the wielder of this shield is subject to a melee attack, they may make a *blinded* bane attack against the attacker. The item makes the following attack: Blinded 5 versus Guard.
